name: Room Escape - Bedroom
description:
You have a very important meeting today, but oh no! You lost your bedroom keys! How will you attend that meeting now? 

How to play:

- Click on objects of interest to interact with them or move closer. Left, right, and bottom movement buttons may appear based on your position. 

- Some objects may be collected, these are used automatically on corresponding objects. 

- Some objects of interest may require completing puzzle or obtaining collectible before they can be  interacted with.

- The goal is to find the Door Key and leave the room.

This short game is inspired by popular escape games from creators such as MildEscape and Neutralxe. 

Full credits list available on: https://www.pencarinama.com/escape/#credits
